dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Rumen Radev of Bulgaria just arrived in Astana for an official visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Rumen Radev of Bulgaria just arrived in Astana for an official visit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of the Republic of Bulgaria Rumen Radev has arrived in Astana, according to Akorda. A solemn welcoming ceremony was held at Akorda for President of the Republic of Bulgaria Rumen Radev, who arrived in Astana on an official visit, the statement from Akorda reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, and Akorda, that's the presidential palace there, right? They held a full welcoming ceremony for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, and Akorda, that's the presidential palace there, right? They held a full welcoming ceremony for him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A solemn welcoming ceremony was held at Akorda for President of the Republic of Bulgaria Rumen Radev, who arrived in Astana on an official visit, the statement from Akorda reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, complete with the honor guard company giving a report and everything. That's a pretty formal protocol.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, complete with the honor guard company giving a report and everything. That's a pretty formal protocol.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The commander of the honor guard company delivered a welcoming report, and the national anthems of both countries were played.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they played both national anthems—that's always such a symbolic moment during these visits.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they played both national anthems-that's always such a symbolic moment during these visits.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The commander of the honor guard company delivered a welcoming report, and the national anthems of both countries were played.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really sets the tone for diplomatic engagement, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really sets the tone for diplomatic engagement, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And they introduced their official delegations to each other too, which is key for building those working relationships.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And they introduced their official delegations to each other too, which is key for building those working relationships.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The heads of state introduced the members of their official delegations to each other.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder what the main agenda is for this visit—economic ties, maybe, or regional security?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder what the main agenda is for this visit-economic ties, maybe, or regional security?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Could be both. Bulgaria's position in the EU and NATO makes it a significant partner for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be both. Bulgaria's position in the E U and NATO makes it a significant partner for Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And having the ceremony at Akorda underscores how important they consider this relationship.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And having the ceremony at Akorda underscores how important they consider this relationship.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's not just a casual drop-in; this is high-level diplomacy in action.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's not just a casual drop-in; this is high-level diplomacy in action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think about how much groundwork goes into these state visits behind the scenes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think about how much groundwork goes into these state visits behind the scenes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally—logistics, agendas, briefings… it's a whole operation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally-logistics, agendas, briefings... it's a whole operation.
